contents.title: Getting to Google
contents.HTMLContent: Type in www.google.com into the browser bar

contents.title: The Search Bar
contents.HTMLContent: The search bar shows what you need to search for

contents.title: The Search Bar
contents.HTMLContent: Start typing in the search bar, as soon as you start typing, google will start showing results

contents.title: The Search Button
contents.HTMLContent: Click the Google Search Button to actually search for something
